basics.name: Panagiotis Antoniadis
basics.label: PhD Fellow
basics.summary: Passionate about combining ML with biology, currently pursuing a PhD at the University of Copenhagen focused on deep learning for biological applications.

work.name: University of Copenhagen
work.summary: Research in deep generative modelling for molecular science, supervised by Ole Winther

work.name: Deeplab
work.summary: Machine Learning Engineer working on generative models for transcriptomics data and on the subject generalization of EEG-based brain-computer interfaces.

work.name: ML6
work.summary: Machine Learning Engineer working on NLP.
